definitions.definition: An inclusive price or amount includes everything:
examples: My rent is $700 a month inclusive (of bills).

definitions.definition: including the first and last date or number stated:
examples: I'll be away from 20 to 31 May inclusive.

definitions.definition: An inclusive group or organization tries to include many different types of people and treat them all fairly and equally:
examples: Our aim is to create a fairer, more inclusive society.
